ingredients.ingredient: 48 large tiger prawns, peeled and deveined
4 green chile peppers, seeded and chopped
1 (2 inch) piece fresh ginger root, chopped

cookingTips: Marinate prawns for at least 30 minutes before grilling for maximum flavor
Thread prawns carefully on skewers to prevent curling during cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This Southeast Asian-inspired dish features bright, fresh flavors. Do you have access to fresh limes and Thai ingredients, or would you prefer substitutions?
